title: While my Sister Sleeps
description: My little step sister has a black belt in her slut skills. She really gets around, and I’m tired of watching all of these other lucky bastards have their way with her. They don’t have to watch the brat parade around in those tight skimpy outfits all day long and then can’t do anything about it because she considers you the best big brother ever.Well, tonight is different. I had to bail her out for the last time. She drank herself unconscious, had the time of her life at that party I had to pick her up from, and now I am going to have the time of my life while she is sleeping. I am finally going to feel her deliciously taboo body beneath mine. This 5,000 word short story is for adults only and features characters over 18, with mature themes such as graphic sex, sleep assault, and pseudo incest. This book caters to your darkest fantasies and is not for those who may be easily offended. Consider yourself warned.
author: Ruby Falls
